validation-error: Please check the information you entered.
login_success: You are successfully logged in. Please check your email address for verification.
not_registered: This email address is not registered in the system.
email_change_sent: Verification code sent for email change.
not_usable_for_verified: This feature activated for unverified accounts. You can't use this feature with email verified accounts.
same_email: You are already using this email address.
unsupported_file: This file format is not supported.
pp_max_file_size: Profile photo size must be less than 1MB.
mailcode_timeout: Verification code timeout. Please request a new code.
mailcode_expired: You reached the maximum number of attempts. Please request a new code.
account_verified: Your account has been successfully verified.
wrong_password: Your password is incorrect. Please try again.
unauthorized: You are not authorized for this action.
rate_limit: You have reached the rate limit. Please try again later.
tos_age: You must be at least 13 years old to use our service.
password_email: Password or email address you entered is incorrect. Please check.
public_email_limit-reached: You cannot add more than 5 email addresses to your account.
public_email_already_exist: This email address is already added to your account.
public_email_deleted: Your email address has been successfully deleted.
privacy_email_changed: The email privacy information has been changed.
public_email_saved: The email address has been successfully added to your account.
